title: Podhum Podhum Lyrics Virattu Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Podhum Podhum
Movie: Virattu
Singers: Andreah Jeremeah, Naresh Iyer,
Lyrics: Karky
Music: Dharan Kumar		 .

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Podhum podhum engiraai
theerum munney ketkiraai
innum inbam venduma ?
po VIRATTU

edho ondrai thaedi
kanmoodi naam povoom
thaedal ellaam theerndhaal
neeyum naanum servomey

yaaru aatu kadhal virattu
yaaru attu kaamam virattu
yaaru attu vedham virattu

Podhum podhum engiraai
theerum munney ketkiraai
innum inbam venduma ?
poi VIRATTU

kannimaikum nerathile
ennai kollayittu pogindraai
micham meedi illaamal
ennai allikondu poginraai

allaamal ooraadhey
ennaalum theeraadhey
ellaamum ennodu vaa theeyai

yaaru aatu kadhal virattu
yaaru attu kaamam virattu
yaaru attu vedham virattu

Podhum podhum engiraai
theerum munney ketkiraai
innum inbam venduma ?
poi VIRATTU

edho ondrai thaedi
kanmoodi naam povoom
thaedal ellaam theerndhaal
neeyum naanum servomey

taadadatatada  aatu kadhal virattu
taadadatatada  kaamam virattu
